```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("ggplot2")

source("analysis.R")
```

## Inside the Library vs Outside the Library

```{r loction_is_lib, echo = FALSE}
df %>% 
  filter(!is.na(location_is_library)) %>% 
  count(location_is_library) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = location_is_library, y = n)) +
  geom_col() + 
  geom_text(aes(label=n), position=position_dodge(width=0.9), vjust=-0.25)
```

## Library-led, external-led, or co-delivered?


```{r delivery_agent, echo=FALSE}
df %>% 
  count(delivery_agent) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = delivery_agent, y = n)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(aes(label=n), position=position_dodge(width=0.9), vjust=-0.25)
```
